custom-sql.sql: SELECT me_daunoinuoc.* FROM me_thongtinkiemdemnuoc LEFT JOIN me_daunoinuoc ON me_thongtinkiemdemnuoc.daunoinuocid = me_daunoinuoc.ID LEFT JOIN me_kiemdemvien ON me_kiemdemvien.TAIKHOAN = me_thongtinkiemdemnuoc.taikhoan WHERE 1 = 1 AND me_thongtinkiemdemnuoc.MATINH = ? AND me_thongtinkiemdemnuoc.MAHUYEN = ? AND me_thongtinkiemdemnuoc.MAXA = ? AND me_daunoinuoc.TRAMCAPNUOCID = ? AND me_daunoinuoc.TENCHUHO LIKE ? AND me_thongtinkiemdemnuoc.daketthucdieutra = ? AND me_thongtinkiemdemnuoc.danhgiakiemdem = ? AND me_thongtinkiemdemnuoc.taikhoan = ? AND me_kiemdemvien.idQuanLy = ? [$DATE_NGAYTAO$] [$DATE_NGAYKIEMDEM$] AND me_daunoinuoc.NAMBAOCAO = ? AND me_daunoinuoc.IDNGUOITAO = ?

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM me_thongtinkiemdemnuoc LEFT JOIN me_daunoinuoc ON me_thongtinkiemdemnuoc.daunoinuocid = me_daunoinuoc.ID LEFT JOIN me_kiemdemvien ON me_kiemdemvien.TAIKHOAN = me_thongtinkiemdemnuoc.taikhoan WHERE 1 = 1 AND me_thongtinkiemdemnuoc.MATINH = ? AND me_thongtinkiemdemnuoc.MAHUYEN = ? AND me_thongtinkiemdemnuoc.MAXA = ? AND me_daunoinuoc.TRAMCAPNUOCID = ? AND me_daunoinuoc.TENCHUHO LIKE ? AND me_thongtinkiemdemnuoc.daketthucdieutra = ? AND me_thongtinkiemdemnuoc.danhgiakiemdem = ? AND me_thongtinkiemdemnuoc.taikhoan = ? AND me_kiemdemvien.idQuanLy = ? [$DATE_NGAYTAO$] [$DATE_NGAYKIEMDEM$] AND me_daunoinuoc.NAMBAOCAO = ? AND me_daunoinuoc.IDNGUOITAO = ?
